item.title: Game of Thrones Live Concert Experience announces 2019 North American tour dates
item.description: Game of Thrones Live Concert Experience announces 2019 North American tour dates [<a href=“https://consequenceofsound.net/2019/05/game-of-thrones-live-concert-experience-tour-dates-tickets/” target="_blank>read more] - This fall, the Emmy-winning music of Game of Thrones will again be brought to life with an immersive outdoor concert tour across North America. Now in its third year, the Game of Thrones Live Concert Experience will be led by series composer Ramin Djawadi. E… [+2025 chars]
